src:
Agnez Mo Papar Cerita Bakal 'Mejeng' di Madame Tussauds
06 Nov 2019, 10:03 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Agnez Mo mengungkapkan cerita ia bakal jadi salah satu figur patung koleksi Madame Tussauds Singapura. (CNN Indonesia/Feri Agus Setyawan)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Agnez Mo mengungkapkan cerita dirinya bakal menjadi salah satu figur patung koleksi Madame Tussauds Singapura dalam waktu dekat. Hal itu ia ungkapkan melalui sebuah video yang diunggah di Instagram miliknya, Rabu (6/11) dini hari waktu Indonesia, sekaligus mengonfirmasi kabar yang sudah beredar."Hai semua, saya baru bangun dan ingin konfirmasi, ya, saya akan bergabung dengan Madame Tussauds Singapura. Mereka bakal bikin patung saya, ini kabar yang menyenangkan," kata Agnez Mo dalam video tersebut.Sebelumnya sejumlah media telah mengabarkan bahwa penyanyi asal Indonesia yang kini berkarier di Los Angeles itu akan menjadi salah satu sosok yang dibuat patungnya oleh tim Madame Tussauds."Kami telah merahasiakan ini namun rilis medianya sudah terbit dan fan terus bertanya kepada saya sepanjang pagi dan mereka ingin ada konfirmasi," kata Agnez Mo."Tapi, ya, saya akan bergabung dengan Madame Tussauds Singapura. Ini menakjubkan!," lanjutnya.



Menurut rilis tim Madam Tussauds Singapura yang diterima CNNIndonesia.com, Agnez Mo akan menjadi pesohor hiburan pertama dari Indonesia yang dibuat versi patungnya oleh museum tersebut."Apa lagi ya? Oh, 8 November tim mereka akan terbang ke LA, dan bakal melakukan wawancara, merinci, mengukur, dan sebagainya, mungkin bakal makan waktu 8 jam," kata Agnez Mo. "Banyak ya," Menurut pernyataan dari Madam Tussauds Singapura, mereka akan membuat perincian dan pengukuran lebih dari 200 aspek terhadap Agnez Mo.


Agnez Mo akan menjadi sosok dari Indonesia berikutnya yang bakal dibuat versi patungnya oleh jaringan Madam Tussauds. (Screenshot via Youtube/@AGNEZMOofficialVEVO)

Selama proses tersebut, Agnez Mo disebut akan mengabarkan kepada penggemarnya melalui akun Instagram miliknya dan siaran langsung lewat akun resmi Madam Tussauds Singapura. Penggemar Agnez Mo pun bersemangat atas informasi ini. Sedari Rabu pagi, para penggemar Agnez Mo telah meriuhkan media sosial lewat trending #AGNEZMOMadameTussauds.









Agnez Mo menjadi tokoh asal Indonesia berikutnya yang dibuat versi patung oleh jaringan museum Madame Tussauds, setelah Joko Widodo di Hong Kong pada 2017; Soekarno di Hong Kong dan Bangkok pada 2012; Anggun di Bangkok pada 2016; serta legenda badminton Rudy Hartono di Singapura. (end)
text:
Agnez Mo Papar Story of 'Mejeng' in Madame Tussauds
06 Nov 2019, 10:03 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Agnez Mo revealed that he would become one of the Singapore Madame Tussauds sculpture figures. (CNN Indonesia / Agus Setyawan Ferries)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Agnez Mo revealed that he will become one of Singapore's Madame Tussauds collection figures in the near future. He revealed this through a video uploaded on his Instagram on Wednesday (6/11) in the early hours of Indonesia, and at the same time confirmed the news that had circulated. "Hi everyone, I just woke up and want confirmation, yes, I will join Madame Tussauds Singapore. They will make my statue, this is exciting news, "Agnez Mo said in the video. Previously a number of media had reported that the singer from Indonesia who is now a career in Los Angeles would be one of the figures made by the Madame Tussauds team. "We have kept this a secret but the media release has been published and fans keep asking me all morning and they want confirmation," said Agnez Mo. "But, yes, I will join Madame Tussauds Singapore. This is amazing," he continued.



According to the release of the Singapore Madam Tussauds team received by CNNIndonesia.com, Agnez Mo will be the first entertainment celebrity from Indonesia to make a sculpture version of the museum. "What else is that? Oh, November 8, their team will fly to LA, and will conduct interviews, detailing, measuring, and so on, it might take 8 hours, "said Agnez Mo. "Lots of it," According to a statement from Madam Tussauds Singapore, they will make details and measurements of more than 200 aspects of Agnez Mo.


Agnez Mo will be the next figure from Indonesia that will be made a version of the statue by the network of Madam Tussauds. (Screenshot via Youtube / @ AGNEZMOofficialVEVO)

During the process, Agnez Mo is said to be reporting to his fans through his Instagram account and broadcast live through the official account of Madam Tussauds Singapore. Agnez Mo fans were excited about this information. From Wednesday morning, fans of Agnez Mo have stirred up social media through trending #AGNEZMOMadameTussauds.









Agnez Mo became the next Indonesian figure to make a sculpture version of the Madame Tussauds museum chain, after Joko Widodo in Hong Kong in 2017; Sukarno in Hong Kong and Bangkok in 2012; Anggun in Bangkok in 2016; and badminton legend Rudy Hartono in Singapore. (end)
